{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|get_source_line}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect |
template&lt; Object T &gt;
struct get_source_line;
}}

Provides the member constant {{tt|value}} equal to the [[cpp/preprocessor/line|presumed line number]] of the declaration of the entity or typedef-name reflected by {{tt|T}}.

=== Helper variable template ===
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr auto get_source_line_v = get_source_line&lt;T&gt;::value;
}}
{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit2 |the presumed line number of the declaration of the entity or typedef-name reflected by {{tt|T}} |std::uint_least32_t}}

===Example===
{{example|The following code shows the source code line of an object or a class.|code=
#include&lt;experimental/reflect&gt;
#include&lt;iostream&gt;

using refl = std::experimental::reflect;

float f;
struct P{};

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; refl::get_source_line_v&lt;reflexpr(f)&gt; &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; refl::get_source_line_v&lt;reflexpr(P)&gt; &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
6
7
}}
